name: Loaded Runner
shortDescription: A side-scrolling action runner game set in an industrial environment, featuring shooting and melee combat.
fullDescription:
Loaded Runner is a fast-paced, side-scrolling action platformer. Players control a young character who navigates across industrial platforms and avoids obstacles in a pipe-filled, factory-like setting.

Unlike traditional runners, the game incorporates robust combat mechanics, providing the player with on-screen controls for Jumping/Moving, Shooting, and Melee Combat.

Key Features:

  • Action-Packed Runner: Enjoy a side-scrolling game that combines running and platforming.
  • Combat Mechanics: Engage enemies using both shooting (gun icon) and melee (fist icon) controls.
  • Industrial Setting: Navigate through challenging, obstacle-filled industrial and factory environments.
  • High Score Goal: The primary objective is to achieve a high score and collect yellow star coins.
